Investing

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position=”left”][vc_empty_space alter_height=”medium” hide_on_mobile=””][vc_column_text]

To make low interest loans to farmers, small businesses and struggling families, FORGE needs money to lend. FORGE currently has 200+ member investors with investments ranging from $50 to $250,000. FORGE currently offers interest rates above the current CD rates to investors with over $500 in their accounts. The interest rates and terms are negotiable. No investor has ever lost any part of their investment with FORGE. Investors with balance of $500 or more automatically become voting members of the organization.

You can invest in FORGE in the following ways:[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space alter_height=”none” hide_on_mobile=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle”][vc_column icons_position=”left”][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title=”Regular Account” tab_id=”regular-account”][vc_column_text]Accounts of $500 or less provide funds for the revolving loan fund. All interest earned is utilized for operational support of the FORGE General Credit Fund.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Interest Earning Account” tab_id=”interest-earning-account”][vc_column_text css=””]An investment of $500 to $5,000 earns interest payable to the investor. Please contact us for current rates. Investors may elect to donate all or a portion of the interest back to FORGE for operational support.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Large Interest Earning Account” tab_id=”large-interest-earning-account”][vc_column_text css=””]An investment of over $5,000 earns interest payable to the investor. Please contact us for current rates. The investor can elect to donate all or a portion of the interest back to FORGE for operational support.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Special Investment Accounts” tab_id=”special-investment-accounts”][vc_column_text]For investments of $10,000 or more, contact a member of the FORGE staff for current terms.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position=”left”][vc_empty_space alter_height=”none” hide_on_mobile=””][vc_cta h2=”” txt_align=”center” shape=”square” color=”green” add_button=”bottom” btn_title=”Start an Investor Account” btn_style=”flat” btn_shape=”square” btn_color=”inverse” btn_size=”lg” btn_align=”center” css=”” btn_link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forgefund.org%2Fcontact%2F|title:Contact|target:_blank”]For more details, or to start a FORGE Investor Account, please contact a member of the FORGE staff.[/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]
